short_summary: RFSA - British Columbia Coastwide Ecosystem Monitoring Service
description: Coastwide is defined as Offshore, Vancouver Island, Haida Gwaii and the BC mainland coast and inlets. Technical specifications and terms of the supply arrangement details will be provided inSep/2024 RDFSA solicitation A for ongoing qualification cycle procurement including mining activities.
full_summary:
# RFSA - British Columbia Coastwide Ecosystem Monitoring Service
**Procurement Notice**

The Government of Canada, through Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO), has issued a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for a British Columbia Coastwide Ecosystem Monitoring Service. This open bid solicitation aims to establish a supply arrangement for a variety of ecosystem sampling services across the BC coast and inlets.

**Background**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a qualified supplier to perform ecosystem sampling services, including imagery analysis, ecosystem sampling, species, environmental variables, and habitat analysis. This services scope includes two (2) procurement umbrellas: the PSIB Stream for First Nations, Tribal Councils, or First Nation-owned Businesses, and the General Stream for any supplier.

**Notice Type**
The RFSA is a Request for Supply Arrangement, inviting qualified suppliers to submit an arrangement for the provision of the specified services. The arrangement will be established for a term of five (5) years, from the date of issuance to March 31, 2030.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is set aside from international trade agreements under the provision for measures with respect to Indigenous peoples or for set-asides for small and minority businesses.

**Security Requirements**
There are no security requirements applicable to the Supply Arrangement.

**Submission Information**
Eligible suppliers can submit a response package by December 18, 2024, at 1:00 PM ET. The response package should be submitted according to the instructions outlined in the RFSA document.

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: December 18, 2024, at 1:00 PM ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 3, 2025
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2030

**Eventual Contract Opportunities**
Upon the solicitation's closing, Fisheries and Oceans Canada will post a notice on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow new suppliers to become qualified. Existing qualified suppliers will not be required to resubmit an arrangement.

**Submission Documents**

* RFSA Document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52501/30006201---rfsa.pdf
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52501/30006201---dama.pdf
